title: For the Rest of My Life - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Older Love Interests   Poor to Rich   Student-Teacher Relationship   Weak Protagonist
author: Twentine
description:
Hu Fei said to He Li Zhen: “It’s best for you to not mind that kind of student. Anyway he is a b*st*rd. Why should he come over to our the school?

Li Chang Jia said to He Li Zhen: “It’s the first time I hear you say harsh words. Unexpectedly, you do this for that kind of person.”

Jiang Zhu Ren (Leader Jiang) said to He Li Zhen: “Don’t you feel ashamed?”

Peng Qian said to He Li Zhen: “Don’t listen to them, let me ask you , how many women could ‘step on the tail of youth’ and be loved by that kind of man.”



>
